attributes.action: Revoke recognition of the United States Declaration of Independence 1776
attributes.additional_details:
The Declaration of Independence is only legitimate if other countries accept its legal status. What is the basis of their territorial claim to this land except a piece of paper.  
It can be agreed that nobody is going to fight the United Kingdom militarily over the future of America.
For the future security of NATO and the West, It is imperative that these Thirteen Colonies are brought under the control of the United Kingdom. 
We cannot allow a failed project to continue for another 250 years.
attributes.background: Bill to be passed stating the UK no longer recognises the legal status of the USA as an independent country, and the original Thirteen Colonies to be legally returned to The United Kingdom of Great Britain.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.
